options.command: yarn run openapi-generator-cli generate --git-repo-id=toolbox_apiclient --git-user-id=daytonaio -i apps/daemon/pkg/toolbox/docs/swagger.json -g go --additional-properties=disallowAdditionalPropertiesIfNotPresent=false,packageName=toolbox_apiclient,moduleVersion=$DEFAULT_PACKAGE_VERSION,generateInterfaces=true,enumClassPrefix=true,structPrefix=true -o libs/toolbox-api-client-go
